rules.description: If the customer code is not found in master file, display Customer Not Found message and terminate process.
rules.condition: customer code is not found in customer master file
rules.outcome: display message Customer Not Found and terminate process

rules.description: If the customer account is blocked, display a warning and prevent further processing.
rules.condition: customer account is marked as blocked
rules.outcome: display warning and prevent customer transaction processing

rules.description: If total transaction amount exceeds credit limit, display error and halt execution.
rules.condition: total transaction amount > customer credit limit

rules.description: Calculate available balance after each approved transaction.
rules.outcome: deduct transaction amount from available balance

rules.description: If the transaction date is prior to the current system date, display error and skip transaction.
rules.outcome: display error and skip processing of the transaction
